usage.eng: If I know what love is, it is because of you.

usage.cn: 我们不会高飞，是因为我们把自己看的太重。
usage.eng: We can't fly high because we overweigh ourselves.

usage.cn: 不要因为结束而哭泣，微笑吧，为你的曾经拥有。
usage.eng: Don't cry because it is over, smile because it happened.

usage.cn: “因为爱过，所以慈悲；因为懂得，所以宽容。”
usage.eng: I have mercy because I have loved. I am lenient because I have learned.
